page.title: 01West Coast Snippets
page.content: The land in this area although wet and boggy plays an important part in the life of the people,because through the reclaimation of rough grazing by the Forestry, people are employed to plant trees and various tradesmen to maintin machinery vehicles. the workshop in Cairnbaan employs approx 46 workers and they help to look after 3-4miles of forests which include confiers, ash oak and hawthorn trees. The Cairnban Motor Inn is situated on the banks of the Crinan Canal and this year alone 2,045 yachts passed throughthe Canal, also 755 fishing boats so ('passing trade' is no small figure. The canal is 9 miles long, has 15 locks, 6 bridges and gives quite a lot of employment. The houses are scattered throughout the area and the pop is approx 135 residents althought throughout the summer months this is
